text:
Hey Jamie, React + forms on HubSpot can be finicky because HubSpots forms themselves are built on React. Most common things you'll run into are lifecycle issues and conflicts between HubSpot's state and yours. 

Iâ€™d be happy to hop on a quick call early next week if you'd be interested.

Hello, everyone.
Here's Giovanni - a new member in the HubSpot CMS.
I would love to make friends here and discuss about technical problems & projects here.
I am a senior software engineer with 10+ years of web development experience and 5+ years of blockchain development experience.
Hope to meet awesome friends and developers!
